attributes.action: Cut taxes because we are all paying too much and the Government does not know how to use our money wisely
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Do you agree that we are paying too much and the Government is doing nothing to improve our environment?
Do you agree that the Government should start to put road tax towards the roads?
Who is getting sick and tired of Taxes going up all the time?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
